headline: Zodia Custody and Membrane Labs Partner to Power Institutional Collateral Solutions
summary: Zodia Custody, the institution-first digital assets platform backed by Standard Chartered, Northern Trust, SBI Holdings, National Australia Bank, and Emirates NBD, has entered into a strategic partnership with Membrane Labs, a leading provider of post-trade infrastructure for institutional digital asset markets. Zodia Custody will integrate Membrane's loan management infrastructure to underpin and automate key aspects of its collateral management workflows.

headline: Gravis Advisory Selects Northern Trust to Support its OEIC Fund Range
summary: LONDON, August 11, 2025--Northern Trust (Nasdaq: NTRS) has been appointed to provide asset servicing solutions to Gravis Advisory Limited (Gravis) for its open-ended investment company (OEIC) fund range in the United Kingdom (UK).
